this is my experience with Ubuntu at work

==== what works ====
* using windows share for systems in windows domain
==== what does not works and was working on windows ====
* software made for windows
* Internet Explorer specific web sites (installed IE7 using wine-tricks but there was no address bar)
* coping files from windows share to a FTP client (Filezilla) on the desktop machine for uploading on Third machine
==== notes ====
* gnome desktop icons have multi defects like (overlapping, Huge, big horizontal gap after reducing icons size, content preview breaks icons arrangement)
